job description:
Data Analyst/Reconciliation Specialist Job in Westwood, Los Angeles

Do you enjoy working in a fast paced and dynamic environment? Are you interested in gaining experience with a Financial Services and Wealth Management firm? If this sounds like you, were looking for a Data Analyst/Reconciliation Specialist with strong analytical and problem-solving skill set to prepare, review and reconcile portfolio accounts.

As a Data Analyst/Reconciliation Specialist your job duties will include:
  • Reconcile account transactions such as daily cash flows, withholdings and dividends.
  • Utilize Microsoft Excel functions to generate desired results
  • Analyze and effectively communicate all variances you identify
You are the perfect person if you have the following skills:
  • Minimum of 1-2 years in financial reconciliations in an accounting or analytical role
  • A Bachelors degree with a major in accounting, Math, Business, Finance or related field
  • Proficient Excel skills
  • Strong math and accounting skills (youll be dealing with plenty of numbers!)
  • Great organization and communication skills
  • The ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment
This is a temporary opportunity that pays between $20 and $25 per hour. If you are a motivated and enthusiastic finance professional
